name: welterweight
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a boxer who weighs more than a lightweight and less than a middleweight, or this division of boxing weight: The local club turned him into a competent welterweight. Next week he is due to defend his welterweight title. He was the world welterweight champion from 1946 to 1951. One possibility is that he could switch divisions and fight in the future at welterweight. Compare
